metadata.title: SURANO DESIGN JEWELRY Men's Sterling Silver Masonic Symbol Hip Hop Pendant w/ Micro Pave CZ Stones
features: Dimension: 1-9/16 in x 2.0 in (40 mm x 51 mm)

This Pendant is made from 925 Sterling Silver and Rhodium Plated. The Rhodium Finish makes it Anti-Tarnish and gives it a White Gold Look. The quality of this piece of jewelry is Excellent and beautifully designed with Cubic Zirconia Stones. It will definitely make Cool Gift for Yourself or a loved one on any occasion.
